title: joradz
author: joradz
content: Hi to everyone who's reading this, i hate asking help for money, but i really need those 600 USDT so i discovered this forum, and created an account. I saw that newbies have no trust here (legit), but i'm in a dire need to loan 600 USDT, so if someone could help me, that will really be so awesome, if someone can trust me. You can reply under or message me, to discuss the interest and the other matter. Thanks you for reading this, and i hope you have a nice day

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: joradz on August 24, 2023, 07:52:43 PMHi to everyone who's reading this, i hate asking help for money, but i really need those 600 USDT so i discovered this forum, and created an account.This is not a lending platform and not one you should be looking for if you're in need of a loan.Quote from: joradz on August 24, 2023, 07:52:43 PMI saw that newbies have no trust here (legit), but i'm in a dire need to loan 600 USDT, so if someone could help me, that will really be so awesome, if someone can trust me. You are not going to get any trust or any money except your offer a collateral.

comments.author: joradz
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00 on August 24, 2023, 07:57:59 PMQuote from: joradz on August 24, 2023, 07:52:43 PMHi to everyone who's reading this, i hate asking help for money, but i really need those 600 USDT so i discovered this forum, and created an account.This is not a lending platform and not one you should be looking for if you're in need of a loan.Quote from: joradz on August 24, 2023, 07:52:43 PMI saw that newbies have no trust here (legit), but i'm in a dire need to loan 600 USDT, so if someone could help me, that will really be so awesome, if someone can trust me. You are not going to get any trust or any money except your offer a collateral.What Can i offert at collateral ?

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: joradz on August 24, 2023, 08:07:33 PM[What Can i offert at collateral ?The equivalent of the loan amount in another currency besides the one you're asking for.In this case you will need to provide $600 worth of any currency the lender accepts.

comments.author: joradz
comments.body: If i had the money i wouldn't want a Loan. I know this is just a forum where some poeple do Loan, but when you need help you try everywere everything, and i know someone will help me. Maybe not here, but i need to try and do everything i can

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: joradz on August 24, 2023, 08:14:30 PMIf i had the money i wouldn't want a Loan. I know this is just a forum where some poeple do Loan, but when you need help you try everywere everything, and i know someone will help me. Maybe not here, but i need to try and do everything i canYour mind already tells you that you won't get a single person here lending you even a cent, but for some reason you think a miracle will happen. Well sorry to disappoint you, it won't.You have a higher chance of your relatives or friends who know you physically helping you out than any stranger here.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: joradz on August 24, 2023, 08:14:30 PMIf i had the money i wouldn't want a Loan. I know this is just a forum where some poeple do Loan, but when you need help you try everywere everything, and i know someone will help me. Maybe not here, but i need to try and do everything i canYou just came here without any idea of how everything works here you ignore the rules of this board  Lending Board Rules of Engagement - Attention Lenders and Borrowers.You have little regard for this forum you looked at it as a place to take a loan, even in a bank you need collateral to get a loan, what makes you think it's easy to take a loan here without collateral, you just sign up without contribution to this forum.

comments.author: joradz
